    This class uses the Sunflower Seed Arrangement to form a sphere, as opposed to ParticleSphereCSA which uses surface area and circumference.

    ParticleSphereCSA
    This class uses surface area and circumference to position particles, as opposed to ParticleSphere which uses the the Sunflower Seed Arrangement

    This class's sphere looks worse, but is much less chaotic and easier to color with secondary particles.
